categories: Category:Battles of the Hunt for the Eagle

nodes.text: The Raid on Tholatin was undertaken by the Imperial Intelligence in an attempt to capture the terrorist known as The Eagle for the destruction of the Dominator. While the Imperial forces have been able to locate the terrorist's base of operations, it was already abandoned by then. Watcher Two later reported the results of the operation to Cipher Nine, who was investigating Eagle's connection to Tatooine's Ghost cell at the same time.
